attributes.action: Disentitle migrant workers to automatic benefits like tax credits and the like
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No migrant worker should be entitled to any benefits (except medical emergency treatment) whatsoever for the period of 5 years which is required to obtain residency (legally) for all other entry categories to the UK.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Migrantworkers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
